cast.name: 帕特里夏·洛夫兰德 Patricia Loveland

introduction: Marion, an elderly woman, decides to take an adventure and heads off to the travel agents to book a trip to Austrailia where they celebrated their twenty-fifth wedding anniversary. All the time, she updates her diary. Not everything is straightforward, and Marion is faced with a series of challenges but being a feisty and intelligent woman, she tackles these head on bringing humour to otherwise challenging and emotional circumstances.一位上了年纪的妇女，决定冒险一番，然后去旅行社预订去澳大利亚的旅行，在那里他们庆祝了他们结婚25周年纪念日。她总是更新她的日记。并不是每件事都是直截了当的，玛丽昂面临着一系列的挑战，但作为一个活泼聪明的女性，她直面这些挑战，把幽默带到充满挑战和情感的环境中。
